raw_body: DE SILVA – DRUVI – Loving Thaththi of Malaika. Loved son of late Manik De Silva and of Naomi De Silva,​ brother of Kishan and brother-in-law of Sudeshika. Remains lie at God’s Little Acre,​ No. 83,​ Galpitahaboda Road,​ Kadalana,​ Moratuwa from 5.00 p.m. onwards on 15th September 2023. Service at 2 p.m. at Moratuwa and Cremation at 4 p.m. at General Cemetery Borella on 16th September 2023.058934
